response.original_title: Pirates of the Caribbean | Disneyland Resort
response.overview: Set sail on a treacherous voyage to the 17th century! As part of the DisneylandÂ® Resort 70th Celebration we're sending you on a swashbuckling Point of View ride-along adventure! Experience Pirates of the Caribbean, one of Walt Disney's most beloved attractions. See rowdy rogues and ruthless rapscallions ransack Caribbean seaports with all the iconic music, mischievous charm, and Imagineering marvels. Sail past haunted Dead Man's Cove, navigate cannon fire between a fort and a twelve-gun galleon, and more. This is a breathtaking tribute to seven decades of storytelling and the magic of Walt's original park is asking one question: Will it be a Pirate's life for you?
response.tagline: Set sail through Disneyland Resort's iconic pirate adventure in this new Point of View ride-along.
response.title: Pirates of the Caribbean | Disneyland Resort
